name: eatly widget for WordPress
author: Sam Serrien

sections.description:
eatly widget for WordPress displays your latest eatly items in your WordPress blog.

Features

* Simple * Customizable * Takes over the style of your wordpress theme * Uses WordPress resources (no extra files needed)

Usage

Just drag the widget into your sidebar and configure.

Eat.ly projectpage the plugin homepage. See it in action on my homepage.
sections.installation: Drop the eatly-widget folder into /wp-content/plugins/ and activate the plug in.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • You can configure following items: title, username, max items, show title, show photo, show date, show time, switch image link (for lightbox implementation)

Credits

Sam Serrien – Idea & Development

Contact

Labs blog: http://labs.thesedays.com Twitter: http://twitter.com/samzzi
